alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 1:34PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Isolated strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Madison, southwestern Beaverhead and northern Gallatin Counties through at least 230 PM MDT... At 131 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated strong thunderstorms moving northeast at 40 mph across portions of southwest Beaverhead, central Madison, and northern Gallatin Counties. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Dillon, Virginia City, Belgrade, Ennis, Alder, Norris, Dell, Grant, Big Sky, Mcallister, Bozeman Hot Springs, Gallatin Gateway, Laurin, Cameron, Beaverhead Rock State Park, Four Corners, Amsterdam, Jeffers and Church Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Some of these storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
